title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2101/98 of 30 September 1998 amending Regulation (EC) No 1352/98 amending Regulation (EC) No 1222/94 laying down common detailed rules for the application of the system of granting export refunds on certain agricultural products exported in the form of goods not covered by Annex II to the Treaty, and the criteria for fixing the amount of such refunds
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2101/98 of 30 September 1998 amending Regulation (EC) No 1352/98 amending Regulation (EC) No 1222/94 laying down common detailed rules for the application of the system of granting export refunds on certain agricultural products exported in the form of goods not covered by Annex II to the Treaty, and the criteria for fixing the amount of such refunds
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 September 1998.
For the Commission
Martin BANGEMANN
Member of the Commission

(2) OJ L 157, 30. 5. 1998, p. 1.
(3) OJ L 184, 27. 6. 1998, p. 25.
